text: Zisas mba bunin mbe nzua vov khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨ suan saŋv, nde mba bigi shɨshɨgi gumgi mbui tɨvar muuŋ thari. Mbe guigira mba Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi pheni vheri thivav, mba tuavi kaa thivɨv Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨ suaŋrim, mba gumgi gu mbigi mbe ganɨnga ne vuzvugi. Mbe maaŋ mbuim, gu guigira nde nzuai, mbe za won vheza ndigi.
